content:
Today I Read Link https://blog.devgenius.io/redis-vs-kafka-vs-rabbitmq-e935ebbc7ec
What I Learned  Means of communictaion between microservices: sync. and async.  REST for sync. MQ for async.   Considerations for choosing the right MQ:  Broker scale: # messages / sec. Data persistency: the ability to recover messages Consumer capability: Capability for 1:1 or 1:N   Different message brokers and their purposes  RabbitMQ (AMQP) for complex routing Kafka for large amounts of data Redis for short-lived messages
summary:
